message: On the user info page (e.g., https://convore.com/users/michaelschade/), I like that it shows what groups one has in common with the particular user, but I would also find it pretty useful to easily see what groups we don't share. I use this as part of the group discovery process: when I find a friend on Convore, I want to see what he's found that I haven't.

To that point, an easy way to do it might be to get rid of the second list that shows shared groups and just display one list that shows all to which a user belongs. Those that you share might have a little dot to the left of the group name or something, so those without dots are easily identified as being groups you don't share, and those with are groups you do share.
Love the expanding input box, by the way. Thanks for getting that added :)
